attributes.title: HORRIBLE😭😭
attributes.review: this app IS VERY VERY BAD. It’s so glitchy to the point my whole phone freezes. Do not waste your time getting this app. It also scared my child bc of the jump scares! It also caused a weird smell to my phone. HORRIBLE😢 DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.title: GARBAGE

attributes.title: Mason golden
attributes.review: I’ve downloaded this app because I thought it would make my phone great again(mpga) but all it did was take up storage. Also I’d like to add that sleepy joe is wayyy more intelligent then you’ll ever be. MANNY FOR LIFE #blm #blackandyellow

attributes.title: Bad App, Keeps Crashing
attributes.review: The app is horrible! It keeps crashing on me and a lot of other people. This should be taken down immediately!

attributes.title: Very bad app
attributes.review: This app keeps promising me all sorts of stuff and then never delivers. It steals my money, threatens to take my rights away, to lock me in a cage, and worst of all, give me coronavirus! This app is dangerous to everyone. Oh and it’s blatantly racist.
